meanings.definition: A unit of capacitance equal to one trillionth of a farad.
meanings.sent1: I need some picofarads to store a tiny amount of electricity.
meanings.sent2: The electronic device requires picofarads to function properly.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tiny robot carry around picofarads in its pocket?
meanings.sent4: Her brain had picofarads of memory, storing every small detail.
meanings.sent5: The picofarads in the circuit were like minuscule buckets holding charge.

meanings.sent1: The technician measured the picofarads of the capacitor carefully.
meanings.sent2: The picofarads in the system determine its ability to store charge.
meanings.sent3: The picofarads in the battery seemed to gossip about the voltage.
meanings.sent4: His patience was like picofarads, slowly building up over time.
meanings.sent5: Understanding picofarads is crucial for designing efficient circuits.
